review: Nothing like Apple TV. Save your money and get an Apple TV instead.  We wanted one more Apple TV device for the house so decided to go with the chrome cast since it is cheaper. One thing I didn't love is that you had to download an app to play things from your device. The Apple TV is all contained in itself so you don't need your tablet to operate it. Small issue with having to use space on your tablet for that. But the big problem is that we have constantly had connection problems. It doesn't stream as quickly as Apple TV so we sit and wait for it to catch up. But most of the time it can't even connect to the wifi and we get nothing until we trouble shoot. Who wants to do that every time you watch tv. We moved it to a different tv that's in the same room as our modem and we still have issues with it. Simply put, the technology is not nearly as good as Apple TV. You get what you pay for I suppose. Save your $ or spend the extra $ to get Apple TV.
